body_html:
@peigolee
Exactly.
''
import numpy as np
plt.imshow(np.uint8(img_bi))
''
Resized images are showed properly.
Because:
the nn method will not create any new pixel value, type of image/data is unchanged;
the other three methods will create new values.

Exactly.

import numpy as np
